299b3(mdo): rje'i tshe// de bzhin gzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems de la// snod dag zho'i sa bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sgron ma tshal gyi las byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gsal
299b4(mdo): de la ni// a ma 'bra'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'od 'phro na// ro bro 'tshong tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po// skyon zhi de la kha ra'i dum bu phul//
299b5(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs/ kun rgyu tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po la// lo ma da// ga gi ri lu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
299b6(mdo): bde gshegs legs skyes rgya mtsho tshang ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs dang bral de la// na bza' stong phrag brgya ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa
299b7(mdo): nor lha shing 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gsal de la ni// rna bam sgron ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yid gnyis spong ba gser ma ga mtshe// de bzhin gshegs
299b8(mdo): yid gnyis sel mdzad la// gser ka me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'dzind pa dpag myed gser tog tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dpal de la// gser ni
299b9(mdo): sAr gang gtor te 'ul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog sred sded dpon gyi// bu tshe de bzhin gsheg pa gtso mchog la// gser las byas pa'i gdugs dag phul nas kyang
300a1(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa choms myed lcags mgar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs gsung de la// a ha ta ka dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems
300a2(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs myig gnas grong khyer brten po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la// me tog rangs pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa
300a3(mdo): des gnas zags mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gzigs de la// sku regs dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs tshogs can gtso bo 'gor myed bur gyur da tshe//
300a4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa bdud zil gnon pa de la ni// mon sran gre'u li bru mar mar mye phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'gro ba'i 'od zer 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe// bde gshegs
300a5(mdo): shing rta chen pos 'khor bcas bye stong la// rgyal po zhal zas dag ni brim pa byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa phal chen 'khor los bsgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin
300a6(mdo): gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs kyis gshegs de la// dpag tshad bcu ga nyis khyodan tsam bskyed mos tshal phul nas// dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rgyal ni 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe/
300a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer tshis de la// zhabs bsdu ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mtha' yas zhus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu
300a8(mdo): sbed pa de la ni 'dag pa'i ral gyis slong dag 'akang ste bus nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems 'byed do// 'dog shegs don gyi blo gros dad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu rtsa las// 'di
300a9(mdo): dum bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sman pa'i rgyal po phye 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la// bye'i bsod snyoms dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni/
300b1(mdo): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs za ba sbas pa ldan pa'i tshe// dge 'dun dag la yar ku phul nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa'i phung po la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rims
300b2(mdo): myed shing rta mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam blo de la ni// shing rta dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa legs byin bram ze'i bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin
300b3(mdo): gshegs pa tshogs can mya ngan 'das pa na// mar mye'i 'phreng ba dang ba stong snyed phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa grags byin grong khyer mchod rten la// rten pa'i chen
300b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu gsal// grong khyer dag tu gshegs kar me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskye da do// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog byin pa ni// nor bu mazhan tshe de
300b5(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa po// yon tan 'od la nor bu'i bla re phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs skyes bus byin pa thags mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i smon
300b6(mdo): de la// ras kyi kha tshar dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sde ni 'phreng rgyud kyi// bu mor gyur da tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor da ldan 'od zer la/
300b7(mdo): me tog mya ngan 'tshang dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs phul chen byin ni gar mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa stond par dgyes de la// tshigs su bcad
300b8(mdo): pa gcig gis bstod nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zhi ba'i blo gros rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par don sems la// bar shi ka'i me tog dri ldan gtor
300b9(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa spos glang gdugs mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la// gro ba dag las byas pa'i gtugs phul nas//
301a1(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sred byed bu ni khyim bdag che// 'brog dgon dag tu dge slong dge 'dun btung rgya phul// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rgyal mtshan de la
301a2(mdo): ni/ dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gsheg ra la dman las byed bu'i tshe// bslab pa'i ka'i lnga dag ni bzung ba byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par gnas pa de la ni// dang
301a3(mdo): nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs myi tshugs nad pa 'gon myed bor ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po de'i lam// lag mthil tsam zhig phyag dar legs par byas nas kyang //
301a4(mdo): dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla 'go'u ta mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas mchog par spyan la/ dbyar gnas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po bya
301a5(mdo): chu 'du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa glog tog rgya mtsho/ 'i tshong pa'i tshe// zhu brgyad kyis bskor spug las byas pa'i gdu/ kas phul nas// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer de la ni/
301a6(mdo): dang po nyid du byung chub duni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pamachod pa sas byed che// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal pa maHyas la// las btang byams pas rnyed pa yul nas kyang // dngam
301a7(mdo): byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas shing gru batshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzugs de la/ a ma 'bra dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde
301a8(mdo): gshegs ye shes nyi ma rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs de la// lhung bzed dang ni kun 'de phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin
301a9(mdo): gshegs pa rid cer 'od zer la// thos kyi dang bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub duni sems 'byed do// de bzhi gshegs pa phur brtsegs zhas kyi tsho// bde gshegs yul 'khor la ma gyur de la// zhags
301b1(mdo): dus su shing 'ur gcig phul nas// dang po byang chub du 'i sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'dul yang ba'i// dpyar mkhan tshe ma bde gshegs legs mthong dag/ 'brog dgon zhugs tshe lhar tsher gdugs phul nas//
301b2(mdo): dang do byang chub ngu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bshes gnyen bzhed de la// pad ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin
301b3(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom grags pa ni// nor bu mkhan tshe bde gshegs skal bzhed la// nor bu rin cen me shel gcig phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes 'gros ni klu rgyal tshe// bde
301b4(mdo): gshegs nyi zhal sos ka'i dus dag du// lam du zhugs tshe char pa phab nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de ba bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs bral ba gar mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshes/
301b5(mdo): bzhogs pa myed spyan la// me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'dam bu dbul po'i bur gyur da tshe// dgon par bde gshegs seng go
301b6(mdo): stabs de la// bshos dron dag ni yul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs spos bzangs bram ze'i bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma che de la/
301b7(mdo): lo ma dag las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yul 'khor rangs ni shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhon par mdzad de la// bsil yab dag ni dbul ba byas nas
301b8(mdo): kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs lha grags grong khyer brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal de la// gso ras na bza' dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed
301b9(mdo): do// bde gshegs srid mtha' gzigs pa lam ston da tsha// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams snying po yi// lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde bar gshegs pa zla ba
302a1(mdo): spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos de 'chag pa'i tshe// dus kyi rjes 'brang spos ni zho cag phul// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sla gcan las mya'i tshe// de bzhi/
302a2(mdo): gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni// phyag khar gcig cig dbul ba byas nas kyang // pe rje so/ de pa na rgyal bu yi// de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs myed dgyes de la// ta la pa ta dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po
302a3(mdo): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ser ge'i rgyal mtshan rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab rgyal mtshan la// sum pa ka'i lhung bzed phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
302a4(mdo): bde gshegs bsam gtan dgyes pa grong khyer gyi// pho nya tshen bde gshegs mdangs 'od la// me tog rgyan po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zlog
302a5(mdo): ldan rngon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs bzlas byin de la ni// myimyi 'dzums par blta ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam rol rgyal bu'i tshe//
302a6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dbyig de la// dpag tshad khor yug me tog gcal bkram phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan rin cen ljongs gtso tshe// de bzhin gnye/
302a7(mdo): pa mtha' yas 'od de la// me tog tsam pa ka dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs dgra bcom grags pa banyan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa po de ni// gru dag las ni bak+Sha
302a8(mdo): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs pa ngos 'bru mar mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa'i tog de la// dri zhim zhabs bkru ba dag shul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
302a9(mdo): ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mdzod su ldan pa tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs khyed nga rol// lhung bzed zho'is bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chu' du ni sems bskyed do// bde gden
302b1(mdo): spos grags tshor ba'i 'ol po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu yon tan la// lan tsasrang bka' zhig ni phul la kyag/ dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje nor bu'is// de bzhin
302b2(mdo): gshegs pa 'bar ba'i tog de la// tshod sngon chang pa gang zhig bsod snyoms phul// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs tshe dpag byed ni sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sred byed bu de la/
302b3(mdo): myig sman ri lu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs nor bu bkod pa khye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gsal ba'i// lam srang dag tu me tog dkar po phul// dang
302b4(mdo): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang che na gyad kyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dgongs de la// ko/ dra ba'i 'bru dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems
302b5(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan 'byung gnas bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs sems de la ni// ril ba gcig/ cig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed
302b6(mdo): do// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po grags pa'is// phyogs bzhi 'i dge 'dun dag la rdzing phul nas// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros bzang po la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
302b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gzer bcu pa lci bu'i tshe// bde gshegs gzi brjid mtha' yas byang chub snying por ni// snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe na sor mo lnga bsregs nas// dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
302b8(mdo): bde gshegs ma spang shing rta ma khanar gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i phyag de la// lo ma dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs glang po'i 'gros ni grong khyer na// rten pa'i
302b9(mdo): tshen bde gshegs bro sdang la// sha ma ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yid 'thar gnag lhas srung ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rgyal po la// dar ba dag ni dbul pa
303a1(mdo): byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen zla ba lam ston che// bde gshegs bden pa'i tog ni lam dag du// gos kyi bdan dag bting ba byas nas kyang // dang po
303a2(mdo): byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba sman po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par gnas de la// ud pa la'i bkru sman phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rab
303a3(mdo): gsal rgyal po spong brtson pa// dge slong chen bde gshegs dpag myed pa'i// lha la a god dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs la lo sbyar ba dred dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa
303a4(mdo): 'phags pa'i me tog la// tsan dan dmar po'i 'ang bzangs phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs dka' ba'i dbang phyug phyug po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod
303a5(mdo): sbyin chen po la// rol mo'i sgo'is mchod pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gtsug na rin cen/ rtsis pa'is// khye'u tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tog cen la// mchu
303a6(mdo): pa myed pa'i bye ma gtor nas kyang // dang 'o byam chub du ni sems bskyed do/ de bzhin gshegs pa brnyongs bram rtswa 'tshong che// de bzhin gne gas pa nyi ma'i 'od de la// ka bidi ta'i phur ma phul nas kyang /
303a7(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs lngagacan ni shing 'tshod tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od des// rdza las byas pa'i mchil l+h+wam phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// 5
303a8(mdo): gshegs mchod bzang po mong srung tshe// grong khyer dag gi non gyi nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa ma bya'i darol// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dka' sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gnas
303a9(mdo): bkun tu na ma rgyal la// shi lina'i me tog sul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cer phung po phrad 'tshong ma'i// gtso bo chen bde gshegs 'byor da 'od la// nab ma la'i me toH/
303b1(mdo): gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mdzes gshegs tshong dpon bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ni mtha' yas la// ud pa la ni gcig cig phul nas kyang // dang go
303b2(mdo): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ser phyogs gtso blag mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs bstan par dgyes de'i// na bza' bkru bshal dag ni byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do//
303b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa shi nad tu 'thor gshegs glang po'i tshe// rdzi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bde gshegs kyi// gdan ni 'bA ti shing drung bting nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs skye dbang grong khyer
303b4(mdo): brten pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i lha de la// dre ka na'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs blo gros bzang po grong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
303b5(mdo): mtha' yas gshegs de la// a 'bro'i lcug ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'jig te/ na 'od ni spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yul 'khor lha de la//
303b6(mdo): spos rnams dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen gzi brjid bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo za ba de la ni// bal dang 'bras bu dag ni
303b7(mdo): phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tud sems bskyed do// bde gshegs skal ldan shing rta rtswa 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sde'i 'gros de la// me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni
303b8(mdo): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs kun rgyal khrul 'khor mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la// dar gyi lda ldi dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gzhas
303b9(mdo): dka' ba bkod pa tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid phung po la// 'or mar bcas pa'i 'bras rnams phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa stegs ni/
304a1(mdo): // de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po la// ma bya'i bsil yab dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs blo gros 'od 'phro rgyal po yi// btsun mo'i tsher bde gshegs rgyal
304a2(mdo): rjes me tog pa pa'i chang pa gang phul nas/ dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ma'i rgyal la can kyai // de bzhin gshegs pa don grub gshegs de la// lag pa 'dag pa'i ches dag nu
304a3(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa spos bzangs tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sdug de la// me tog chun po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chungab
304a4(mdo): du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs chos brtan nor bu mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i nga rol// rin po che'i gdugs da/ ga bul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du sems bskyed do// bde
304a5(mdo): gshegs gzi brjid drag shul gser makar tshe// de bzhin gshegs bston dpa gsal de la// gser gyi me tog dka ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
304a6(mdo): chos kyi nor bu ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes phung po la// mu tika dmar po dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bzang byin grong khyer rten pa'i tshe// de bzhin
304a7(mdo): gshegs pa kab brjid me tog la/ bshos dron bsod snyoms dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zla ba 'bre brgyud malan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ka zi brjid phung pog/
304a8(mdo): ud pal lnga zhig gtor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs tshangs dbyangs lag tha byed pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul 'od de la// tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /
304b1(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs seng ge zla ba rgyal po yi// pho nya byed tshe bde gshegs gzi mtha' yas// de la mchil lham dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
304b2(mdo): dpal ni tshong dpon bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas la// gser gyi 'phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa legs skyes gser ma kar tshe//
304b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po la// rin po che'i sdong po phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs thub myed tshogs ni 'thun dpor bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
304b4(mdo): grags pa la// sbrad rtsir bcas pa'i 'o ma dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs pa gas pa'i bzhes nyen ded dpon ki// bur gyur da tshen bde gshegs
304b5(mdo): bde ra rtog la// me tog dag gi 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bden ba 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid drag shul la/
304b6(mdo): me tog chang ba gang zhig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs dka' thub chen po tshong dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i tog de la// 'khor rnams thams cad
304b7(mdo): zhus pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sun mon 'od zer 'khor thur rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po chen po dri la ni// rin cen su bar bcas pa'i gdugs 'bum sus
304b8(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan brtsegs pa ded dpon bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa bkod pa de la ni// rin cen snam bu lnga ldi dbul ba byas nas kyang //
304b9(mdo): dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mchod grags rtsal chen lta bu'i bram ze'i tshe// 'khor ni bye bar bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa po// 'jig rten rnam par grags la zhus kyi yo byad phul/
305a1(mdo): dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa chos grags lam ston dme// de bzhin gshegs pa drag shul byin pa'i// 'chags dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang // dpa
305a2(mdo): nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin 'od dpa' bo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu grags de la// rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // ngas kyang chub tu ni sem babyedado// ba ni / zhes /
305a3(mdo): zang da// de bzhin gshegs pa don grub mthu rtsal la// gding ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs
305a4(mdo): pa lha yis mchod de la// spang rtsir bcas pa'i 'bras can phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'tshe byed lha ris pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bder pa po de'i//
305a5(mdo): gtsug lag khang ni phyag dar byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs na chod bzang po rtsa 'tshong tshe// bde gshegs zil gyis myi gnon grags pa la// rtswa'i smon ma
305a6(mdo): dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs legs pa'i tshogs can 'khor spur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 'od de la// ra bza' rin po che dag phul
305a7(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs nam nges blo gros tshong dpon gyi// bu re de bzhin gshegs pa smon chen la// mu kha tsan tra ka dag yul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed/
305a8(mdo): ro// de bzhi gshegs pa srid mthal nor bu'i spos// rim mo btse bde gshegs zlos spyod la// chos kyi bdar dag bsham pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gnags rgyal ma
305a9(mdo): dgyes pa gos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal can de la// chos gos gsum dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs seng ge'i 'od zer lam stond tshe/
305b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thogs myed gzigs pa po// lam du zhugs tshe bskor ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad rin po che// rtogs shes tshe na de bzhin
305b2(mdo): gshegs pa po// yid gnyis spong ba'i 'chags bshams nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa grags mchog spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs che de la/
305b3(mdo): snga ma'i me tog chun po phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs thugs rab gzhungs la phyag dar ba'i// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lha gsal la// mngon gsum dag du bstod pa byas
305b4(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs nor bu zla ba lta bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrul myed gags de la// lha'i gzhal myed khang dag phul nas kyang // dang po
305b5(mdo): byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs drag shul 'od zer// dkon pa'i// dge slong tshe na bde gshegs yul 'khor lha// de la chos gos snam sbyar phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni/
305b6(mdo): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs brtul zhugs thub myed rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes par dgyes de la// gdugs dang dar yug dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems
305b7(mdo): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gros mchod gdol bu yi tshe// nyi ma 'ga' zhig bslab pa lnga mnos nas// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog dpal de la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
305b8(mdo): nor bu'i tshogs ni brgya byin tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'jigs sbyin de la// gser gyi shing rta rkyen bcas stong snyed phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'jig rten bla ma bram ze'i tshe//
305b9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la na// ma d+hu ka'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs glang chen seng ge long ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tha rad pa'i 'od de'i//
306a1(mdo): 'chag sa dag ni cag chag btab nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyal po'i bur gyur da tshe// zla ba bzhir ni dge slong dgen pa'o// gso sman dag
306a2(mdo): sa spyan drangs bde gshegs 'od 'phro la// dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen 'od gzer 'khor lo sgyur ba'i// btsun mo chen bde gshegs yon tan 'byung gnas la// yu ba nor
306a3(mdo): bus spras pa'i rnga yab phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sgra gcan sred pa tshan chen tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i blo de ni// lam du zhugs tshe bsil ba'i rlung ya
306a4(mdo): byas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho grong rdal gyi// byis pa tshe na bde gshegs byang chub 'od// de la tshems shing dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems
306a5(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od gzer ldan pa tshong dpon tshe// bu tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho la// mar mye la ni stong snyed phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde
306a6(mdo): gshegs rab tu zhi stabs kyang kyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub dgyes de la// nor bus spras pa'i mchil lham phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'jig rten
306a7(mdo): bzang po spos 'tshong bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga chen po la bye ba'i sa// bkang ba'i na bza' dpa ni pad ma phul nas kyang // ma nyid byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mya ngam byed pa gos 'tshong khye'u mchi/
306a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa blo ni zab mo do la'ang // rdzi char byung ba'i tshen me tog gdugs phul nas// dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa shugs bcu rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
306a9(mdo): dbang phyug can// lam du zhugs tshe gdan dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs stobs dgyes rol mo mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gtso tshan de la ni// dung sma dag ni bud pa byas
306b1(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mthu dpal rol mo'i klu mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros sems de las// gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba mnos nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems
306b2(mdo): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu thob banyan pa'i tshe// chu bo dag la zam pa btsugs nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od de la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen zhus
306b3(mdo): pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa 'khrul myed la// zhus ras dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan snying po tshong dpon gyi// bu tshe bde gshegs bsod nams 'phag/
306b4(mdo): pa la// d+ha nu ska ri'i me tog gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sem sa bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bden spyod spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nor lho'i bu grags la// spos kyi ri lu dag ni phul
306b5(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshesas pa dge mchog rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dkon can sangs rgyas de la sogs// dge slong dag ni dge 'dun spyan ni drangs nas
306b6(mdo): kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal shing mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od lnga na pa// bde gshegs de la thal sbyar phyag byas nas// dang po byang chub
306b7(mdo): du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od zer chen po tshal gyi las// byed tshe bde gshegs lha'i 'od zer la// ljon pa'i tshon dag sbyar te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa glog
306b8(mdo): 'od rdza mkhan tshe// bde gshegs 'od gsal de la zla ba bzhir// bum pa chu'i sa bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan rgya chen nad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams
306b9(mdo): dgyes de la// ljags kyi sdod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin po che tshong dpodan kyi// bu tshe bde gshegs seng ge'i blo gros la// mu tig dag ni hud 'breng phul nas kyang /
307a1(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal 'od spos 'tshong gi// bu me de bzhin gshegs pas gcol// bye mas bkang ba'i ud dpal na bza' yul// dang po byang chub du ni thos/
307a2(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs gos bgos pa lA bu'i // de bzhin gshegs pa rin cer 'od de la// bstod pa dag gis bstod pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sed nim
307a3(mdo): phyag ni mas kyi las// byed tshe bde gshegs 'od zem pa'ang po la// me tog dag gi pur ma phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bza ze yig ma'an tshe// de bzhin gnye/
307a4(mdo): pa sna tshogs gsung de la// glo ba'i glegs ya dag ni phul nas kyang / dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen mthonapo shal khyer tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba stug de la// mar rtse
307a5(mdo): dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskye da do// bde gshegs rgya mtsho rol mo mkhan gyi tshe// rnga bo ched/ brdung ba byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i gzugs des/
307a6(mdo): dang 'i byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzin 'gar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs des/ mtshan pa dag ni 'bul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tun ma
307a7(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs don tho ga bu nyi mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa myed de la// me tog man dar ba gton nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan brtsegs pa sman pa/
307a8(mdo): // de bzhin gshegs pa zags zla bzhud pa na// 'das rdzab dag tu rdo leb bab bcug nas// drang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan tshogs ni sran pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa na
307a9(mdo): nal de khru nu pa'i 'bras zu cig lus nas// dpa'i byang chu du ni sems babyed do// de gzhen pa na ca byen ri dpon to// de 'ozhin gshegs pacu'i lha res// bedu chu'i snod rgyas bkang gi sus ma
307b1(mdo): dang po byang chub du chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa tshong dus pa// byed tshe dge 'dun dag la 'od smon phul// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
307b2(mdo): bde gshegs 'jig rten zla ba 'khor sbyar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan blo do la// gtsug lag khang ni stong snyed phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan rgyal po'i
307b3(mdo): bram ze'i tshe// phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dag gis bsam gtam khang brtsigs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog mchog ma de la ni// dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs tog
307b4(mdo): bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dga' de la/ ku sha'i na bza' dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gsheg mog can gtso bo bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshes/
307b5(mdo): pa gzi brjid dpag myed la// ril ba chu'i sa bkang ste phul nas/ kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs seng stabs gling gcig rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i
307b6(mdo): tog de la// ras bcos gding ba dpag tshad gcig pa phul// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs drag shul byaM ni tshong dpon gyi// chung ma tshe na bde gshegs nyi 'od la// phye ma spar
307b7(mdo): gad dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs chos kyi dbang phyug 'azeng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od gzer la// me tog chal bar bkram pa kun phul nas/
307b8(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gzi brjid 'od ni lha bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa stonang par dgyes pa po// byang chub snying por phul te rtsa bdan phul// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde
307b9(mdo): gshegs 'od zer chen po'i khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang bar dgyes de la// ras bcos bye ba snyed ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen grags pa rgyal
308a1(mdo): bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig gi 'od gzer la// bla re spos can dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cem gsal ba rin cen tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin
308a2(mdo): gshegs pa bsod nams 'byung gnas de la ni// rin po che dag spar ba bkang ste gtor nas kyang // dang po byab chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs grags pa mthal yas ded dpon gyi// bu tshe bde gshegs me tog
308a3(mdo): dgal de la// na bza' bla re dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od gzer don yod rgya mtsho'i tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phyag ldan de la ni// mu tik+ka dmar po sA
308a4(mdo): pa bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs lha'i drang srong drang srong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgron ma la// lo ma dag gi gdugs dag phul nas kyang // dang po
308a5(mdo): byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs skye dbang 'khor lo sbyar pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od gzer la// gling ba/ zhi dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems
308a6(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs dge 'dun btan pa mtha' 'khob rgyam pa'i // de bzhinag nasapa dzangs pa'i rgyangs cad de sa ni// me tonasnyed pa kram pa'i 'chas sa phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub
308a7(mdo): dun sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bzangs gser 'jo che// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po la// gser gyi glegs pa bkram pa'i 'chags phul// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// 'de
308a8(mdo): gshegs tog ni gser mal khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa'i nyi ma la// mar bye bzang po banapas te phul nas kyang // dang 'o bya btubadu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yul 'khor me tog tsa 'tshong sa/
308a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus btad de la// 'chags na'i sa khebs par bkras nas kyang // dang 'o byang chubatu ni sems babyed do// bde gshegs chos kyi bu gros chod dus pa'i tshe// tshong dus par grang dag ni bya
308b1(mdo): dang byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa blo'i 'od ldan de la ni// dang pa nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs nu shugs ltar gshegs ti mkhye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa
308b2(mdo): de la ni// bsil yab dag gi g.yab pa dag ni byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs legs bsams grags pa gtar mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i blo
308b3(mdo): de la// nor bu skar 'od dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ldan rgyal po'i pho nya tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa dpag tshad la// lan gsum bskor ba
308b4(mdo): dag ni byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs lha tshogs 'khor sbyar blon mchog tshe// de bzhin gshe gas pa seng ge'i mche ba la// gser dang bye ru dag ni phul nas
308b5(mdo): kyang // dang po byang chub dutu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan bsrungs pa 'dron po'i tshe// lam srang dag tu rdo stegs patsugs nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mthu rtsal
308b6(mdo): la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs don gyi blo gros lnga mngon shes pa po// bram ze'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa lha mchog gi// zhabs la 'go bo dag gis phyag dag byas
308b7(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsnyengs myed chu srung ba'i tshe// nyin zhag bdun du byams pa bsgoms nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs gnas la// dang po byang
308b8(mdo): chug du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa grogs brtan gos 'tshang tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mchod rten la// khang brtsegs yon dang dag ni bkab pa phul// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
308b9(mdo): bde gshegs 'od gnas mtshungs pa dge slong tshe// dam chos yongs su bzung phyir spro bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa klog gi 'od zer la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs nor zhabs tshong dpon bur
309a1(mdo): gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal bar dgyes de la// me tog ud pal chang pa gang phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs tha rad pa'i grong dpon bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin
309a2(mdo): gshegs pa lhun po'i rgyal mtshan de la ni// bsod snyoms dang po dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa ngos bzangs phyugs rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
309a3(mdo): me tog 'od de la// zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs blo bzangs phyug po'i bu tshe sangs rgyas kyi// dge slong la thon 'don pa bza' ba byin nas kyang // de bzhin
309a4(mdo): gshegs pa blo gros mchog ma de la ni// dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs kun gzi rab byung zhag bdun dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi ngad ldang bcom ldan gyis/
309a5(mdo): legs par gsungs la rjes su yi rang phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes mchog/ ni dge slong tshe// ting 'dzin 'di la yi rang byas nas kyang // de bzhin
309a6(mdo): gshegs pa yon tan mthu rtsal la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskye da do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs gnas rgyal bu'i tshe// de ban na gshegs pa blo gros khyad par la// yan lag lnga ldan sil snyan dag
309a7(mdo): gis mchod// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsung khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gsal de la// lhung bzed loms bka ba yul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
309a8(mdo): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzangs span pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rin cir smon de la// a mu ra'i 'bras bur dku phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// byede gshegs stobs byin tshong dpon bur gyur dag/
309a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa kazi brjid 'bar ba'o// gtsug lag khang dag skyang nul byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs seng ge'i stabs ni rgya mtsho 'tshang ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs/
309b1(mdo): pa tha ma de la ni// byi ru spar ba bkang ste gtor ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs me tog tog ni rgyal rigs gzho nu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyig la dgyes pa de la ni// rin po
309b2(mdo): che'i 'phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du bya bachub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes 'byung gnas 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mdzes de la// pad ma'i rdzing bu dag ni bul nas kyang // dang
309b3(mdo): po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs me tog byin pa gnas brten tshe// bde gshegs yon tan dpal gyi snying po'i// 'chag sar 'ji ba'i gong bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshes
309b4(mdo): yon tan snying po drang srong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa gsal de la// rgyang ma nas ni thal sbyar phyag byas nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen grags pa shing rtog tshe//
309b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs stobs de la ni// a ti mug ta'i me tog/ gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gne gas grags pa rmad byung rdza mkhan gyi// bu tshe bde gshegs rnam dag
309b6(mdo): spyan de la// chu'i sbyin pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs myi tshugs mdangs rigs khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtul zhugs la// ba ru ra'i
309b7(mdo): 'bras bu gcig phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsnyengs myed rgyal chen nam thos bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhabs dag brtan pa de la ni// lha rdzas dag gi cin dag gis gtor nas kyang /
309b8(mdo): dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyal po'i// mdun 'don byed tshe bde gshegs dpags spyad de// zhag bdun par du gdugs tshod gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
309b9(mdo): bde gshegs tshangs par gshegs pa 'anyan pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tha rad par dgyes de la// chu bo 'gram dag bstan cing mtshon nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs lha'i mthu rtsal tsho
310a1(mdo): dpad nga/ phyobs pa'i din can no gang sngamams kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa byung sa du sa // rang brgyang chub tu sems 'byed do// sa sa kyis parol 'ad// de na
310a2(mdo): gshegs pa yul 'khor mchog de la// lha'i zhal zas dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gsheg pa lta bden sman rtsa 'tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa legs par spyan pa'i
310a3(mdo): 'od de ni// snyun gyi gso sman dag la rtag tu spyan drangs nas// dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs nor bu'i snying po nya ba'o// khye'u bde gshegs so ra~M las de la// me tog bzhi zhig dbul ba byas
310a4(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yo na tan grags pa dka' spyod tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gsal de la// zhugs lang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //
310a5(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes dang/ la ni bca ba mkhan bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sna/ nga mdzad grags de la// lhung bzed bca' ba dag gis bkang ste/
310a6(mdo): phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bcings myed brten bcas koc-ika pu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa sdang ba mchog doni// gdugs tshod gsol tshe spangs
310a7(mdo): bklad nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rtul zhugs brtan pa blon che'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par gzigs de la// khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni se
310a8(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs lha'i gzi 'arjid dam chos nub pa'i tshe// dge slong chos sgra spros shig ces brjod nas// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba lta bur gsung de la// dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gsheg
310a9(mdo): tshangs par thub pa rgyal po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bla ma'i dbyangs de la// grong khyer dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs dal bzhud dge slong brgyad pa'i tshe// de bzhin
310b1(mdo): gshegs pa bsod nams dpal de la// so pA ra ka'i btung ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs brtul zhugs dka' thub phyag dar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba
310b2(mdo): mkhyen pa po de'i// lam srang zhu bcu srid du phyag dar byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od zer phung po khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po do// 'jigs
310b3(mdo): pa myed pas dkon par spyad drangs nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gzi brjid chen po rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rims nad myed pa'o// blo mnga' de la rgyan dag phul nas kyang // /
310b4(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs tsam pa ka ni rgyal phran tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dul ba la/ u sI ka dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems
310b5(mdo): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mdzad bram ze'i ni// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sa de sa// bas kyi lugs dag ni lus nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs tshogs can bzang po lta bu'i tshe/
310b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bdud rtsi de// chos kyi 'khor lo bsgo ra tshe legs pa phul// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mchod sdod srung ba'i tshe/
310b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa myed pa grong khyer du// gshegs pa'i tshe na mchod sdong dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
310b8(mdo): ba bdud rtsi'i phung po la// sman gyi reng bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du na sems bskyed do// bde gshegs snga ma'i me tog 'od ni gar mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan de la ni// snga ma'i me
310b9(mdo): tog dag gi 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sems can 'od ni chang 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra de la ni// phye mas bskos pa'i me tog gtor nas kyang // /
311a1(mdo): rang sa kyang chubacun sems bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa.un pa da ga dru pa// da zhi gnanas dan pa'i sa pa// na/ di gdan gto nas kya // dang po rgyu na
311a2(mdo): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mdangs 'gro shing rta mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lci bsnyengs thob de la// bzhugs khri'u dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// @
311a3(mdo): gshegs don legs des ni rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa dgyes de la// zhag ko cig bzhugs pa'i gnas ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs khyu mchog blon
311a4(mdo): ce'i bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo mya 'khrul de la// seng ge'i ba dan khri dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems paskyed do// /
311a5(mdo): bam po nya shu lnga pa// / bde gshegs lag bzangs thams cad byed pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro
311a6(mdo): dka' de la// gos kyi dum bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od zer chen po lag bla tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mchog de la// skyu ru ra dag/
311a7(mdo): dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsam pas byin ni zhus pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul mchog de la// phyag dag bkru ba'i cha ba ni phul nas kyang //
311a8(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsod nams 'od ni dbul po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i gdugs de la// bshos dron bcud dang bcas pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems
311a9(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen dbyangs ni ri mo mkham gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyad dag ni bris nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i 'od ldan de la ni// dang po nyid du byang chub tu'i sems
311b1(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs rdo rje sde ni bcings pa myed pa po// ral pa can gyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa po// mthu rtsal drag shul can la rdo le ba phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub ngu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshen
311b2(mdo): pa 'byor ldan 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gzi brjid la// tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs seng ge'i stobs ni phyag dar ba'i tshe// de bzhin
311b3(mdo): gshegs pa srid pa'i mtha' ni gzigs pa bo// bcom ldan de ni phrag la blangs te 'dam rdzab bskal// dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs dri myed spyan ni 'dri mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa khrel
311b4(mdo): yod bzang po la// ka la man dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od srung sbyangs nas dge spong che// bde gshegs rgya chen gzugs kyi 'chag sa dag/
311b5(mdo): lhung bzed 'bru mar bkang bas chag chag btab// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs blo gsal rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i spyan de la// 'od gzer chen po me
311b6(mdo): to// dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes 'gros ni rgya mtsho'i tshong po'i tshe// nyams thag tshe na sangs rgyas dag la phyag 'tshal zhes// tshig tu brjod
311b7(mdo): nas bde gshegs tshogs kyi 'od gzer la// dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gzi brjid drag shul makar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i mchog de la// dngul las byas pa'i lhung
311b8(mdo): bzed phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od zer chen po tshong dpon bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam par bzhag pa bdag nyid de// nyin gcig bzhugs pa'i gnas ni
311b9(mdo): byas te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gnyi 'od grong rdal byis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tog de'i// ras kyi gdan dag gding ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub
312a1(mdo): du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs dri myed 'od ni mdun 'on tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa skye dbang mtshungs de la// chos sbyin dag ni ra ba phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// /
312a2(mdo): bde gshegs gzi brjid rnam 'byes chang 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs myed bshes gnyen la// la ru btung ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs khengs myed
312a3(mdo): rtsis pa'i khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsdus pa'i blo mngal la// ci tshe'i phub ma pra sA gang phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs spang rtsi'i gzhal n-i lham mkhan tshe// de bzhan
312a4(mdo): gshegs pa dgra thul de la ni// me tog ud pal dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zla 'od rten bcas nad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zam pa'i 'od
312a5(mdo): de lta// mon sran gre'u rul pa dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang/ chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa klo ka byin rgyal po'i tshe// yid 'thad khang pa brtsegs pa phul nas kyang /
312a6(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rab zhing gshen/ sa pa shing 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rtse gcig 'od de la// chu dron snod dag bkang ste phul nas kyang // drang po byang chub
312a7(mdo): dA ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs myi 'azhugs pa yis dge slong dag la ni// ji srid 'tsho bar gnod sems byed pa 'dzin bcug nas// de bzhin gshegs pa sred myed bu'i mthu mal la// dang po nyid du byang chub
312a8(mdo): ni sems bskyed do// bde ku shegs dgra bcom grags pa rdza ma'an tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zhabs de la// spos kyi za ma tog dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde ga
312a9(mdo): chos kyi yon tan byam mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dgyes de la// khang pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub drin sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zhing bzang lha'i rdul zhugs tshe/
312b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsal de la// ku gul bdug pa dag gis bdug nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bkod pa'i rgyal po 'khor sbyar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba'i 'od/
312b2(mdo): de la// bye dUr+ya'i khang bzangs phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mngon 'phags lha la dad po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge rnam bsgyings la// me tog dag las byas pa'i
312b3(mdo): gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sbyin bsreg 'od 'phro ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnyog myed la// bka sa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang
312b4(mdo): chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs par dpal phyug po'i bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa gsal ba po// bde bar gshegs la pad ma'i me tog gtor// dang po byang chub tu ni
312b5(mdo): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin can bkod pa khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo de la// khron pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde
312b6(mdo): gshegs shind tu bzang po lam ston bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa gti mug spangs pa de la ni// ljon pa'i lcug ma nyi shu snyed dag/ phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde
312b7(mdo): gshegs rin cen mchog ni shing mkhan gyi ni tshe// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan phung po de'i// gtsug lag khang gi sgo dag byas te phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
312b8(mdo): thugs ni shin tu gzhungs pa phyugs rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bsdu ba'i blo ni mnga' ba de// lam srang dag tu gshegs te gos dag bting nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rgya
312b9(mdo): mtshos byin ni mdun 'don tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa skal ldan shing rta la// me tog dag gi gzhal myed khang pa phul// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshang tog zhing pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
313a1(mdo): bde pa'i mthums sa// son man mes 'brul gang gton nas kyang // dang po byang chub dun sems 'byed do// bde gshenas tha gdugs rnyi su gaka sa// de bzhin gshegs pa sa tshogs gsung de la/
313a2(mdo): byug pa dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'gro smos 'tshong tshe// bde gshegs phyogs rnams gzigs pa sangs rgyas kyi// gtsug laka'ang dag spos kyis 'dus
313a3(mdo): nas kyang // dnga'i byang cu 'duni sems bskyed do// de bzhi gshegs pa dri byed rgyal po ni// ri mo ma 'an che bde gshegs ston gsal de'i// sgo gang dag ni ri mo bris nas kyang // dang po byang chub duni sems bskyed do//
313a4(mdo): bde gshegs ye shes mgus pa gos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegasab nges par rtogs bzod la// ngobazhes grang brgya dgani nu kyang // dang po slo chu ba rgyan sems bskyed do// bde ga shegs
313a5(mdo): rgyal tshong dpor bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gdun/ sa de la// rin chen me mo de dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan 'od ni mthing ma 'an
313a6(mdo): tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyis kyi thub pa// mthing bor / gcig dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub duni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa sla rmugs gos 'tshong che// de bzhin
313a7(mdo): gshegs pa mi tog la// mu gas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// gzugs nu rgyas byugs kyi dpon po che// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i bdal la// chu ba dag
313a8(mdo): babyas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems 'askyed do// bde gshegs pad ma 'od gzer bram ze'i// rdul gtso'i bu ma ba gshegs kun gzigs la// de tib pa bdag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byung cu 'dun
313a9(mdo): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs brtul zhugs pa'anga'i sdod gud la'adakyil// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od ldan de ladi// 'dras rdus khrim pa gang dag yul 'byas nas kyang // dang sa bya brgya bdu ma 'i
313b1(mdo): bskyed do// bde gshegs smon rgyal bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i tshogs can la// skum khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs glo na/
313b2(mdo): kau tog mi ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa don ni dgongs pa la// na bza' phrugs gcig cig ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od zer rgyal po rdza mazhan tshe//
313b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi rgyal po la// khrus rkyen bum pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs skar mkhan tshal gyi las byed tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i zhal de la//
313b4(mdo): lo ma'i gding ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sem sa bskyed do// bde gshegs grags rdzogs nor bu tshong ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par dgongs de la/ rin po che'i tha
313b5(mdo): re phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs par snying stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhi na gshegs pa ljon pa'i rgyal mtshan de la ni// dri gsung ldan pa'i
313b6(mdo): skyed mos tshal dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rgyal ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dag de la ni// rin can gdugs ni bye ba stong snyed
313b7(mdo): phul// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs spyan mdzes grong dpon bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i mthu rtsal la// me long dag ni bre re phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
313b8(mdo): bde gshegs rtog pa myed don shing srung tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi gtso de la// tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub ngudu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs drag shul sde ni khye'u'i tshe// de bzhin
313b9(mdo): gshegs pa spos dang zhim po la// phyag dar snyim pa gang zhig gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsod nams gzi brjid lci 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pas bsngags de la/
314a1(mdo): lhung bzed bkru phyir lci bo'i kong bu phul// dang po bya chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mthu mal can ni ma 'tsho che// de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams mu stegs la// nA gur dag ni yul ba byas nas kyang //
314a2(mdo): dngad po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs thogs myed blo ni 'akar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhes rab 'od de la// mtshon cha dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
314a3(mdo): sma gcan lha ni sngags ma gar gyi// khye'u'i tshen de bzhin gshegs pa po// ye shes go cha la mi 'ab phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes phung po 'dreg ma lan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
314a4(mdo): mnangs stobs de la ni// sreg shang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs la lo sgyur ba dbul po'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa kazi brjid drag shul la/
314a5(mdo): mchil lham rim gcigs phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni/ sems bskyed do// bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs ni grong khyer na/ rten tshe bde gshegs sangs rgyas dgyes de la// mon sran gre'u dang
314a6(mdo): gis gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs me tog tog ni rgyal gtso'o// khye'u'i tshan bde gnags gsal rgyal la// mchis ma'i snod dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang
314a7(mdo): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sgra gcan 'dzin ni 'dreg mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa po// bcom ldan de'i sen mo bcad nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gan
314a8(mdo): rtsa sman chen po zags mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid gnyis rnam gnon la// ras kyi 'tshang dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rgyu skar rgyal po tsho ngus pa'i tshe// de bzhin
314a9(mdo): gshegs pa don ni legs par dgongs de la// bum la mar gyis bkang ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub duni sems bskyed do// bad ga shegs sman pa'i rgyal po tshong dpon bur gyur tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po che
314b1(mdo): be de la ni// lha'i khang bzangs dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsod nams glang po 'bru mar gyi// mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags dul la// zhabs bsku
314b2(mdo): ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gtso mdzad smad 'tshong bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa gsal de la// me long dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang
314b3(mdo): chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rnam grags rgyal po khrus pa'i// khye'u tshan bde gshegs bsdu ba'i blo mngal la// 'dag pa'i tshal dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs
314b4(mdo): nyi mo'i 'od zer dge slong dbyar gnas pa// rim gro ba tshe de bzhin gshe gas pa dbyar gnas pa// de la zhus chu ba dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa chos
314b5(mdo): mdzod dka' thub can gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen gnas/ su phyind pa la// mtshan mo mar mye dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs blo gros bza
314b6(mdo): po sman po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ger rol// a ru ra dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan dbang mtshungs rtsa mthun tshe// de bzhin
314b7(mdo): gshegs pa kun tu ran cen la// ba tra ka ri dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sde ni tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten kun dga' la// lhung bzed snang /
314b8(mdo): rdzas bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs shes rab brtsegs ni dngon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa b+ha ra ga rdo rje'i// lam srang dag ni mtshon pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu
314b9(mdo): ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa legs gnas bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i dbyangs de la// bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa
315a1(mdo): blo dbyangs phreng rgyud che// de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma stabs de la// snga ma'i me tog bdun zhig phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs tshangs dbyangs lam ston khye'u'i tshe//
315a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ded dpor de la ni// gser gyi me tog dag ni gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan mchog ni zhing po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa myi'i zla ba la// bal sran spong po
315a3(mdo): spur gang gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'brug sgra'i dbyangs ni rtsis pa'o// khye'u tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa bkod chen la// 'phreng ba'i chun po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du
315a4(mdo): ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mngon shes tog ni rigs gtso'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od de la// dar dang bdug pa dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshes
315a5(mdo): pa tog 'od rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes dag ldan ba de'i// zhabs gnyis dag ni bkru ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dge
315a6(mdo): khyim bdag tshe// bde gshegs srid mtha' nor bu spos de la/ rgun sman spyad thug dag ni gsol nas kyang // dang po byang chub du rnaM sa mas bskyed do// bde gshegs tshangs pa mtheng bu 'tsheng bu'i tshe/
315a7(mdo): de gzhi gshegs pa zhi bar gnas de la// mthi bu'i nor bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang 'o byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs skyes mchog tshong dpo bur gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa bskum por/
315a8(mdo): ku kum dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs spyan sug spos 'tshong khye'u tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod de la// spos kyi phye ma spur gang gtor nas kyang //
315a9(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs klus byin rdza ma khan chu po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pang mochen po la// chu'i sa bkang ba'i snod dag yul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin
315b1(mdo): gshegs pa bden tog tshong dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa dgyes de la// gser gyi khri stan dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa brgyan pa spos 'tshong tshe//
315b2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas pa gsal de la// spos kyi phur ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zhum myed dbyangs ni lcags mgar tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas
315b3(mdo): la// lcags las byas pa'i snod dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen 'od ni ded dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i 'od zer la// spos kyi rdo gu dag gis bdug nas kyang //
315b4(mdo): dang po byang chub du sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni byin pa'i sa// de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bzod de la// ra byid ka cha brom gong bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed//
315b5(mdo): bde gshegs seng ge dag ni mgar ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa// me tog chen po pa// de la khab dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'od zer sna

315b8(mdo): pa ma las blo la// me tog snyim pa bkang te gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mye tog rgyas pa lag bla'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nor byin de la ni// dus ma yin par bcud ldan
315b9(mdo): btung ba phul// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mthu rtsal stabs ni ral pa can// sbyin bsreg mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'o// zhum myed dpyas la zhugs ling phul// dang po byang chub muni
316a1(mdo): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsod nams phung po chong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs de la// lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems

316a3(mdo): gshegs pa skar mkhan spos 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i gzugs de la// spos kyi rgyu dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub ngu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zla ba'i smon pa slongs me'i tshe// de da ni
316a4(mdo): gshegs pa rnam 'byor de sems pa la// 'gron bu nyi shu dag niH/ tor nas kyang // drang po bya chub du ni sems bskyed do// bdegan/ gas kA ze brji daphung po lnga 'dran tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa za ba khor

316a6(mdo): shid rta dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mya zad shing rta mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu gdul dkal la// bzhugs khri'u dag ni dbul
316a7(mdo): 'byus nas kyang // dang po byang chu btsun sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mngon togs spya ni sman pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshenas pa kun tu gzigs de la// ldag sman dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chu dun
316a8(mdo): sems bskyed do// bude gshegs ldan lag rgyas pa byugs rdzi'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i smon de la// lhung bzed dar bas bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po bya chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yul Sha/

318b7(mdo): myed grags pa slong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha dga' de la ni// mo can dag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bden gI phung po chang 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang
318b8(mdo): mtshungs de la// rdza rnga dang lo ma phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// da bzhan gshegs pa/ dbyangs snyan rtsa 'chang cha// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan rtswa 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa stabs chen de la
318b9(mdo): ni// rtswa spyil dag ni byas te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub d+ha ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ri dbang mtshungs ni rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs// de la gdugs dag dbul ba byas nas kyu //
319a1(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs chos brtsegs lha'i bsnyen bkur ba// byed che bde gshegs bsod nams brtsegs pa la// me tog chang pa gang ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu
319a2(mdo): ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs thar pa'i gzi byi rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i zla ba la// tsu ka kra ru ka'i 'bras bu brgyad phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs legs mdza
319a3(mdo): kar mkhan bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa spyad sdug de la ni// ras khal dag gi 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang po bya ba chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rab zhi sku ni 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa snyan par klag
319a4(mdo): de la// tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba phul nas kyang // dang 'i bya ba rdul du ni sem sa bskyed do// bde gshegs yid 'ong ga su na dmaka s+yai'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dpal de la// ras yug dgani
319a5(mdo): dbul pa byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zlo dbyangs ldan po'i tshe// bde gshegs ser don mche ba dgongs mal du// 'bru mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang /
319a6(mdo): dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya lca gdu gas mkhan mo// de bzhin gshegs pa na cem mchod 'os la/ dus su bsil yab dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub drun
319a7(mdo): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs seng ge'i logs ni ded dpon che// de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim 'od de la// sgo dang mo cher po dag ni byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs chos kyi mthu ma
319a8(mdo): rgyas bu mo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra zhing gyur da ba la// dngul las byas pa'i bdar zhi phul nas kyang // dngapo bya bcu bdu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sal pa bzang po dang dpon // de bzhin gshegs pa kyi
319a9(mdo): ba'i mthu de la// gser las byas pa'i bla re phul nas kyang // dang po bya ba tub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs kyi 'khrugs la dog ni sa la la na // de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i bro de la// rje'u bu dag ni dbul 'phya
319b1(mdo): nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gzi brjid rgyal po grong dpon tshe// grong khyer dag ni phyag dar byas nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid go bgos la// dang po byang chub du ni sos/
319b2(mdo): bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs mdzad lag blo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa nges par rtog bzod la// ka ra bi ra'i me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs spyan legs/
319b3(mdo): phyugs rje'i dpon po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla mchog dpal de la// lhung bzed mo ra nas bkang phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs don gnas blo ni nad pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs
319b4(mdo): pa glang po'i stabs de'i// nyin mo bzhugs pa'i gnas khang phyags nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs don gnas 'od gzer lha 'bangs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa

323b5(mdo): bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i snying po la// rna rgya na 'phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs bral bram ze'i tshe//
323b6(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od de la// me tog ta ra na 'as gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes bzhed pa dbul po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa
323b7(mdo): bkod pa chen po la// phongs pa byed pas spyad dag drangs nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs spobs spyan dka' thub can kyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i 'od de la// lo mo'i spyil bu
323b8(mdo): dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhi tha chad ma ma da mi rnyen pa nga sha sa 'i/ ga ci ladas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zla gning
323b9(mdo): thun tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i 'od de la// ba ru ra'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin cen zla 'od tshang ba'i tshe// bde gshegs yid gnyis las ni 'das
324a1(mdo): pa las// nor bu rin cen me shel phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsnyengs myed mdun 'don bur gyur 'o// bde gshegs 'khrul pa byed pa'i blo ldan la// sin dung/
324a2(mdo): ri me tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gzigs pa chen po na thun tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rtul zhugs 'byor da de la/ a ga ru'i 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni
324a3(mdo): sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs dbyangs sban pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag mdzes pa la// rgya shug 'bras bu'i 'greng ba phul nas kyang // dang po bya bachub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gzhes
324a4(mdo): dbyangs bzangs lha ris po'i tshe// bu yug langs tshe khang pa byukla nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs myed dgyes de la// dang po byang chub tsu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zhes rab che stegs nan ma
324a5(mdo): tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam grags dbyangs de la// pi li ling gi 'bras bu phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs blo gros zla myed tshong ba'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dbya
324a6(mdo): ni nar po de// nyim 'ga' zhig bzhugs par gsol nas kyang / dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rdo rje ma ny+dzu gas ni byis pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'byed ldan/
324a7(mdo): til dang bres pa'i 'bras dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang bachub tu ni semasu bskyed do// bde gshegs bya bachub blo gros rdza mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa chen po la// me tog 'ba' shi ka dag gtor nas kyang
324a8(mdo): dang po byang ba cu 'du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ljon shing dbang po'i rgyal po'i// po nyi chen 'di gshegs gzugs gsas la// sku rags gcig cig phul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
324a9(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs lad 'dron po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal chen po ro// 'jigs pa myed pas lam ka spyan drangs nas// dang 'o byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsod nams stobs ni tshong dpon ce/
324b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar gzigs de la// zhun mar dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpal dge slong tshe// bzod pa dag ni bsgom pa byas nas kyang // de bzhin
324b2(mdo): gshegs pa gnod pa spangs pa la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags dgyes dgon pa'i dge slong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba gsal de la// sran gyi phye tshal dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub
324b3(mdo): tsu ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa pa mthu stobs 'phreng rgyud tshe// de bzhin gshegs po rims myed dpal de la// 'bras bu sar pa mchog dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs skar dgyes
324b4(mdo): bana' ba mkhan gyi che// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom stegs des/ snod dag spang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub dun sems bskyed do// bde gshegs sprin gyi rnga swa spos 'tshong mo/
324b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa blo ldan legs bstsags la// u shi ra'i phye ma phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan dga' sdug pa'i zhal// phyag dar ba tshe/
324b6(mdo): rnga chen brdungs nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gsal de la// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes barba nga ldan mdun dpon tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gzi brjid la/
324b7(mdo): snod dag 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byor da ldan rten bcas tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mchod gnas la// la tu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //
324b8(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan phung po kun tu rgyu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbyangs de la// kr-i pA li pags pa phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gzhes/
324b9(mdo): gsal ba rgyal po'i bu mo'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog nyi ma la// gser gyi 'phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs chos kyi rgyal mtshan slong ba'i tshe// de bzhin
325a1(mdo): gshegs pa legs kanas zhabs de la// gos kyi ras ma sor bzhi tsam phul nas// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs ye shes nga ro tshong dpon gyi// bu tshe de bzhin gshegs
325a2(mdo): gagasal tog la// tshems shing dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' shing thun tshe// bde gshegs snga ma'i me tog gsal de la// rgya bug dag ni me
325a3(mdo): tog phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs mchod spyi dang ro brten bcas tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs kyi 'od de la// bal sran gre'u dang sbyar ba'i 'bru mar phul// dang po byang chub du na/
325a4(mdo): sems bskyed do// bde gshegs shes rab rnam 'god pa ro na/ ral pa can tshe bde gshegs yon tan bzhed// de la dka' thub gnas dag phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub d+ha ni sems bskyed do// bden
325a5(mdo): yon tan 'od zer gzi brjid bzab mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs/ pa chos kyi me tog de'i ni// chos gos snam sbyar dag ni drub pa/ byas nas kyang // dang po bya ba drub du ni sems bskyed do// bde ga/
325a6(mdo): dra srong dpon po bsod snyoms tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi da mdzes pa la// 'ab ral dkani dbul ba byas nas kyang / dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs blo ldan phyugs
325a7(mdo): rje'i dpon pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba snar mdzad la// lhung bzed 'o mas bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs spobs pa'i tshogs ni rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin
325a8(mdo): gshegs pazhi ba'i 'od de la// tsam pa ka'i tshal dag sus nas kyang // rang 'o byang chubadu ni sems byer do// 'dreg nags mdzod sbyi babang po zhing rkun mo// bde gshegs kun tu yon tan mchog de la// shing sris
325a9(mdo): rag dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub dun sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa tha zhal yang 'tshong tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid nam rgyal la// zhun mar dag ni dbul la byas nas kyang // dang po h+yam
325b1(mdo): chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs shin tu gzigs pa da nu ma'am// byed med de bzhin gshegs lhas mchod la// bag chos dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
325b2(mdo): bam po nyi shu rtsa drug pa // de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral 'dreg mkhan tshe//
325b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i dbyangs de la// spu gri dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yon tan tshogs ni zhus pa'i tshe// bde gshegs 'khrul pa myed par sbyor ba la//
325b4(mdo): khrus khang dag ni byas te phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sem sa bskyed do// bde gshegs me tog ldan pa khyim bdag tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba
325b5(mdo): dag/ dbyar gnas zla gsum zhal zas ro brgyas gsol nas// / dang po nyid du byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs yu// la 'khor spobs pa dbul po'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa yid
325b6(mdo): 'od dbyangs de la// mar mye'i snying po dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs rin te na rab sbyin byi ma byed pa'i tshe// nyi ma dga' zhig tshangs par spyod pa
325b7(mdo): mnos nas kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu dbyangs can de la ni// dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs zla ba dgyes pa rgyal bu'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam sbyangs pa la// sge'u gnyer
325b8(mdo): me tog dag gis gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs khengs myed bca' ba mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa lha 'dod de la ni// mar zhu dag na dbul ba byas nas kyang /
325b9(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs seng ge'i stobs ni bram ze'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab stobs de la// am 'bra'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
326a1(mdo): bde gshegs dbang sgyur rgyal po khyim bdag tshe// bu tshe bde gshegs kun tu gzigs de la// sle tres lo ma dag ni phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bdud
326a2(mdo): rtsi gsal ba mchongs mkhan tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod de la// gser snam dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs bsam gtan snyoms pa shing /
326a3(mdo): srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i me tog la// me tog dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs 'khrug myed tshong dpon bur gyur da tshe// de bzhin gshegs
326a4(mdo): pa nam mkha'i blo de la// nor bu rin cen glegs ma yul nas kyang / dang po bya chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs dr-i darab gi phyug po'i// bu che de bzhin gshegs pa rlabs 'joms
326a5(mdo): gdu bu dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs phyogs ma bskrad pa khyim bdag kaM/ bu tshe bde gshegs shes rab rdzogs pa la// mar khu dag ni dbul
326a6(mdo): ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde ga kas mdzes pa bu ram shing srungs tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tsher ma dkrugs pa la// bu ram shing dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //
326a7(mdo): dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal bzangs tshong pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra dbul de la ni// mu tika dmar po dag gis gtor nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do//
326a8(mdo): bde gshegs shugs gnas ye shes rdza ma 'am tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom dgyes pa la// bum brgya'is bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang po byang chub du ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gsung dbang bcal
326a9(mdo): mkhan gyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims mchod gnas la// bcal ba dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang po byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do// bde gshegs gzi brjid sman pa chen po'i che// de bzhin gshegs pa byor/
